messages.message:
Steve
1) It looks like the weather for Vegas on Friday and Saturday will be in the 50s (degree F) at night, and about 70 during the day. 

2) Bring a state ID, drivers license, or passport. If you plan on going to clubs you will probably be carded.

3) Please eat a big meal for lunch before 4. We will discuss stopping for dinner, but if possible I'd like to just eat snacks and eat dinner when we get there.

If you have any last minute concerns or suggestions, please let me know!

~Steve

Brian
Although, there is an In-N-Out in Kingman that we usually hit up.  For people that don't travel out of Flagstaff much this could be a unique experience.

Jessica
Oh, another note: bring a jacket. Vegas gets pretty cold at night. I think the lows are in the low 50s, but there will also be no sunlight, obviously. I find that I usually need at least a light jacket at night, sometimes even during the summer. So I advise everyone to pack one, just in case.
